ygData.subject: Re: Fwd: How many lutes do they have in Kelethin anyways?
ygData.msgSnippet: To my knowledge the quest is infinite. I ve done it atleast 30 times and never had a message to say stop. Though exp will not add up to as much you will still
ygData.messageBody:
To my knowledge the quest is infinite. I've done it atleast 30 times and
never had a message to say stop. Though exp will not add up to as much
you will still get the money.

"Catherine M. Campbell" wrote:
>
> From: "Catherine M. Campbell" <cathyc@...>
>
> Oh, I agree, it's very lucrative, but I was wondering if there was a cap to
> the number of times you can do it. Does anyone know? We came across a
> fellow bard who was selling silks yesterday and didn't realize that there
> was a quest for them. Now he's after every spider he can see along with
> the rest of us.
>
> --Kendrin.
> Tunare
